game.name: Avalanche Santa Ski Xmas
game.description:
Oh no! It sounds it is time for the dangerous avalanche! And the problem is that your favourite Santa is alone. No one is there to help him out except you. Would you like to take this pledge and show him the path towards the survival? Join Avalanche Santa Ski Xmas and be prepared to help him guide through all the obstacles while collecting the gifts and staying safe until he accomplishes his most important job! Be careful as the avalanche will give him no extra time to survive in this brand new adventure game!

Put your finger on your mouse and get ready to tap the screen to control him to ski as far as you can! The longer you stay the higher number of hidden characters you will be able to unlock. Christmas is just approaching and Santa does not have enough time to arrange the gifts for his children so it is your responsibility to collect as many as you can. Jump over the obstacles and try to assist Santa land safely using his skis in this HTML5 fun 2D game!

2D Christmas cartoon game art animation is used in the making of this stunt jumping arcade game that features a lovely side-scrolling ski. You will see a hill track that is also full of beautiful snow. Try to avoid the obstacles for as long as you can to create a new high score in this cool platform game! Check out more popular free adventure titles on atmegame.com to find some really entertaining and engaging hours without download! We cover online games for players from different age groups so you are rest assured to be entertained irrespective of your age and gender.
